description:
Ryuji disappeared! The wolf girl Ai and her master have taken Eriko`s Lost Precious and Ryuji. However, the Lost Precious reveals the lies between her and her master, leading her to try to flee with Ryuji! Why does her master, a high level breaker and a researcher, hate the society? What happened 15 years ago? Emotions clash in this final battle!
Source: crunchyroll
